Function reference

Quality Control Review

qcr
Quality Control Review

Control Charts

Independence univariate parametric

These functions are used to compute the quality control statistics for the different univariate control charts for variables and attributes. The control charts consider are: Xbar chart, R chart, S chart, I chart, p chart, np chart, c chart, u chart, CUSUM chart, EWMA chart.

qcd()
Quality Control Data
qcs() qcs.continuous() qcs.atributte() qcs.dependence()
Quality Control Statistics
qcs.xbar()
Function to plot the Shewhart xbar chart
qcs.R()
Function to plot Shewhart R chart
qcs.S()
Function to plot Shewhart S chart
qcs.one()
Function to plot the Shewhart xbar.one chart
qcs.p()
Function to plot Shewhart p chart
qcs.np()
Function to plot Shewhart np chart
qcs.c()
Function to plot Shewhart c chart
qcs.u()
Function to plot Shewhart u chart
qcs.cusum()
Function to plot the cusum chart
qcs.ewma()
Function to plot ewma chart
plot(<qcs>) plot(<qcs.xbar>) plot(<qcs.S>) plot(<qcs.R>) plot(<qcs.one>) plot(<qcs.p>) plot(<qcs.np>) plot(<qcs.c>) plot(<qcs.u>) plot(<qcs.ewma>) plot(<qcs.cusum>)
Function to create a plotting 'qcs' object

Independence non parametric

These functions are used to compute the quality control statistics for nonparametric control charts based on data depth. The control charts consider are: Q chart, r chart, S chart.

npqcd()
It creates a data object for Non Parametric Quality Control
npqcs()
Statistical Quality Control Object
npqcs.Q()
Function to plot the Q chart
npqcs.r()
Function to plot the r chart
npqcs.S()
Function to plot the S chart
plot(<npqcs>) plot(<npqcs.r>) plot(<npqcs.Q>) plot(<npqcs.S>)
Plot method for 'npqcs' objects

Independence multivariate parametric

These functions are used to compute the quality control statistics for the different multivariate control charts. The control charts consider are: MCUSUM chart, MEWMA chart, Hotelling T^2 chart.

mqcd()
It creates a data object to be used in Multivariante Quality Control
mqcs()
It computes statistics to be used in Multivariante Quality Control
mqcs.mcusum()
Function to plot mcusum chart
mqcs.mewma()
Function to plot mewma chart
mqcs.t2()
Function to plot t2 Hotelling chart
plot(<mqcs>) plot(<mqcs.t2>) plot(<mqcs.mcusum>) plot(<mqcs.mewma>)
Plot method for 'mqcs' objects

Independence functional parametric

These functions are used to compute the quality control statistics for the Phase I and Phase II control charts.

fdqcd()
It creates a data object to be used in Functional Data Quality Control
fdqcs.depth()
Function to plot depth functional data (DFD) - chart
fdqcs.rank()
Function to plot rank functional data (RFD) - chart
plot(<fdqcd>)
Plot method for 'fdqcd' objects
plot(<fdqcs.depth>)
Plot method for 'fdqcs.depth' objects
plot(<fdqcs.rank>)
Plot method for 'fdqcs.rank' objects

Process Capability Analysis

These functions are used to perform process capability analysis and capability indices.

qcs.cp()
Process capability indices (parametric)
qcs.pcr()
Process capability indices for a given dataset and distribution
qcs.hat.cpm()
Process capability index (estimate Cpm)
qcs.cpn()
Process capability indices (Nonparametric)
qcs.ca()
Capability Analysis
mstate.control()
Multivariate process state
npstate.control()
Non parametric process state
state.control()
Univariante process state
mqcs.add()
mqcs.add Add a matrix, data.frame or array object with a mqcs object
npqcs.add()
npqcs.add Add a matrix, data.frame or array object with a npqcs object
qcs.add()
qcs.add Add a data.frame object with a qcs object

Datasets

Databases used in the package

archery1
Target archery dataset in the ranking round (used as Phase I)
circuit
Circuit boards data
counters
The performance of the counters data
dowel1
Dowel pin dataset
employment
Level of employment data
orangejuice
Orange juice data
oxidation
Oxidation Onset Temperature
pcmanufact
Personal computer manufacturer data
pistonrings
Piston rings data
plates
Vickers hardness data
presion
Level of pressure data
